should be the device, not the brand
BlackBerry is a proper noun. To pluralize a proper noun add -s.
/* Criticism */ Removed highly dubious section about 3G performance. A blog post by some marketing guy/iPhone fan is not a source of factual information.
replace device image with SVG logo

wording fails to make sense if document is ever printed. "here" should not be used as link text. use nouns, avoid propositions.
/* Criticism */ Just adding the reasoning behind RIM not utilizing touch screens on their devices, that I recently learned in a class on selling Blackberrys.

moved portion about India to criticism
/* External links */ actually, the builtforblackberry is an official RIM site :)
/* Criticism */ the current generation does not have a touch-screen, but future generations might, also removed non-objective POV in last sentence.
/* Keyboard */ removing non-objective POV, all cell phone keyboards are tiny
/* Supporting software */ Removed non-encyclopedic writing and improved grammar
Added the ability for the BlackBerry to triangulate its location.
/* See also */ Don't capitalize "Device"; it's just a device, not a "Device".

rm redlink & external link. Please let's not make "external links" an advertising listing of application vendors...

Changed abreviation of Research in Motion from RIM to RIMM as the later is its stock symbol and has become a more widely recognized abreviation.
/* External links */ Removed spamming external links
/* CPU */ first BlackBerrys ran on 386s, not 286s
Date/fix the maintenance tags or gen fixes using [[Project:AutoWikiBrowser|AWB]]
rv to Dec 2 version ("RIM job" is just vandalism)
Date/fix the maintenance tags or gen fixes using [[Project:AutoWikiBrowser|AWB]]
Reverted to revision 174830167 by [[Special:Contributions/212.48.162.225|212.48.162.225]]; Vand. using [[WP:TWINKLE|TW]]
/* Phones with BlackBerry e-mail client */ afd
Robot - Moving category Cellular Device to Mobile phones per [[WP:CFD|CFD]] at [[Wikipedia:Categories for discussion/Log/2007 October 30]].
/* CPU */ Correct CPU named and wikilink
Date/fix the maintenance tags or gen fixes
Since I found it easier to use once I unlearned T9, where is the proof, reviews, and why wouldn't they find it worthwhile? Also proof that RIM have been slow adding features - and who asks for them?
Which providers, in which countries, what value? And should this be in the "supporting software" section anyway and not in a "pricing" section?
Proof needed that it is expensive owning a BES and that 3rd party hosted solution has no costs
/* Criticism */ This shareholder is adding more criticisms when it's not in my best interest to do so :-)

/* Criticism */ Partial revert - legitimate criticisms, but we need to keep touchscreen criticisms (Note: I am very PRO BlackBerry and I own RIM, but I believe in NPOV - so I'm adding MORE criticisms)
/* Models */ Okay, I did it. I finally shortened the list, now that it's a separate article. (may need intro paragraph).
/* Models */ Allow me to introduce a major contribution: [[List of BlackBerry Models]]. It's time to start pruning the models section, it's gotten too big.

just added in that it was seen in transformers which it was
